data.title: Labels for industry and commerce
data.text:
Whether you need labels as an information or advertising medium, contact provides you with the best quality. Due to our wide selection of labels, materials and formats (dies), at contact you will find the ideal solution for all your purposes. We cover nearly all industry sectors and application areas. Whether campaign labels, tags or shelf labels for commerce, to films and loops up to nameplate labels or logistic label â€“ with contact you will find the right label to suit your needs. We also produce labels for thermal printers and labels with printed barcodes.

As a professional label printing company, we can implement over 85 material combinations and more than 3,000 different printing dies in almost all geometric shapes. We advise you individually when selecting the colour, size, upper material and adhesive (gumming) of the label. For example, you can choose between matte and high-gloss papers or different films as well as special colours, finishing and winding directions.
